Name: Disrupting Lazor
Overcharge: Target must return their Bingo chip and draw again

Name: Disabling Lazor
Overcharge: Disable target's activated item for the next round

Name: Focused Lazor
Overcharge: Deal an extra 1 damage to target

Name: Vampiric Lazor
Overcharge: Gain full health if your attack kills target

Name: Prismatic Lazor
Overcharge: Deal 1 damage to up to 3 opponents sharing your letter or number
